name: Sgt. Smiles
description:
Overview:
Prepare yourself to step into the shoes  of Sgt. Smiles!
Use your force-field to deflect bullets, interact with objects, and to rescue the hostages!
Face 31 daunting levels of intense timing and reaction challenges!
Enjoy interesting level mechanics that will keep you on your toes! Attempt to reveal the mystery behind the captors and their motives!
Controls:
Use the direction keys to select things in the main menu and control Sgt. Smiles.
Press Enter to pick an item in the main menu and skip cutscenes.
Press Escape to return to the main menu.
Press R to Restart a level.
Press F to use your force field.
Use W, S, A, and D to place hostages above, below, to the left and to the right of you, respectively.
